entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
